record.id: field.name="reset.field.name" and file.name="report" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: reset.field.name
record.file.name: report

brief.brief: The field name or variable name to use to test for control/condition breaks.
Service Manager resets the calculated variables on each break.

detail.detail: Every time the value of the field or variable changes, the indicated subtotals form is printed and all variables defined in Variable Names On Format field are reset to zero and the next detail record is printed after the report takes a top-of-page break.
If no subtotals form is defined, only a top-of-page break is taken on the condition break.
